review: I wanted it to stream Netflix and, specifically, Amazon Prime on my roommate's television. It does this perfectly. The picture is clean, it doesn't jam up the WiFi like Chromecast does, and the remote app for Android is super convenient. (Never lose the remote, yay!)
author: C. Mabee

review: Love it ! It also allows me to use my fire device as a remote too. A total up grade from my app vizio and my roko box. A+++
author: Rating My Best Pick

review: Amazon did a GREAT job with this product!  I've had an Apple TV for years now and I actually prefer the fire stick over the Apple TV.  Easy to use and plenty to stream.  Great job Amazon!  I also had a Roku and I would say I like this over that too.  My Dad has a Roku as well and also prefers his Fire Stick over that.  It's also cheaper than both Roku and Apple TV.
author: Carla

review: They are really great and easy to use but ever since we started using these (we got 2 for 2 different tv's) we've had problems withour Wi-Fi reception.  Sometime everything works great, but other times in middle of streaming we get cut off, or video keeps spooling.  I checked with our provider and they say speed of our router is good, so I'm not sure if these sticks use too much power.  I also have a Roku.
author: Virginia D.

review: I have both Chromecast and Apple TV, and this Fire TV Stick is every bit as good when it comes to Netflix, etc.  Quality is excellent.
author: Lou B.

review: Very easy to set up.  No problems with remote or installing batteries.  Wish it would work when I traveled which is one of the reasons I bought it!
author: maureen mumford

review: Works for about 10-20 min then loses wifi connection and wont reconnect. Have to un-plug and plug it back in then it works for maybe 30-45 min and does it again.
author: tattooedassclown

review: Love it! Absolutely love it! I bought my wife a TV for her sewing room, for Christmas. I choose the Fire TV stick because of Amazon Prime. I couldn't be happier with it. Amazon Prime, Netflix, Hulu Plus all on an extra TV. It was cheaper than spending an extra $100 for a smart TV. The Fire TV Stick turned her TV into a smart TV for less than 1/2 the price.
author: girard roberson

review: Great product, next I will buy the Fire TV to compare.
author: BarbaraJean
